text: Very tasty and fresh Lebanese-style pizzas! Call ahead, they make it to order. Super friendly family business. The spinach-cheese triangles are heavenly and always fresh!
Delicious food at unbelievably low prices! Great Lebanese pizzas and tons of choices!

Friendly place, very good Lebanese style pizza, freshly prepared wide selection, vegetarian and meat lovers even a desert pizza. They have frozen home prepared meals but did not try them. Prices are affordable for what you are getting. Not a fancy place but good for takeaway or for quick eat in place. Will come back again
